entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 6.

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy late this evening with 60 percent chance of light snow late this evening and overnight. Risk of freezing rain late this evening and overnight. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 1 April 2023
